arts.sum: Barcelona are gearing up for their toughest challenge yet this season as they take on Paris Saint-Germain in the UEFA Champions League tomorrow. It will be a special game for Luis Enrique, who returns to Barcelona as a European champion once again, though this time in PSG colours.
